q: that the" investigation" will reveal that hacking was carried out by two rogues rather than one. And we won't swallow that either. Why? Note this sentence in Robinson's report: " It is also understood that Glenn Mulcaire said in the court statement that several other executives at the News of the World were aware that phone hacking was taking place, although he does not name them. under President Bush , Donald Rumsfeld issued thousands of memos," snowflakes," they were called. He reads from some issued in 2003 and in 2005:" Are we winning or losing the war on terror?" Is the U.S. government changing fast enough? " Do we need more troops? And if so, where and for what purpose?" Another Donald Rumsfeld Rule:" If you are not criticized, you may not be doing much." decision taken by the International Committee of Museums( ICOM) to establish an international supervision committee to oversee and monitor the Egyptian Museum in an attempt to protect it following the recent attempt to loot it.
